channel.title: Getting Started on
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on

item.title: What is the USB Nugget?
item.description: The USB Nugget is a cute, powerful HID attack platform that features a screen, buttons, and Wi-Fi support for flexible payload deployment created by Kody Kinzie and Alex Lynd. Run and edit payloads over Wi-Fi from mobile and desktop devices, or use the quick-select menu to launch payloads at the press of a button. Watch each command execute in real time on the built-in screen, and get instant feedback on your attack from the built-in LED.
